definitions.definition: The pungent, spicy fresh or dried fruit of any of several cultivated varieties of capsicum peppers, used in cooking.
Powdered chili pepper, used as a spice or flavouring in cooking.
(Indian Chinese cuisine) a spicy stew of chicken or paneer, capsicum and onion, eaten as an appetizer.
A dish made with chili peppers and other ingredients, such as beans and beef.
A person who has not yet reached adulthood, whether natural (puberty), cultural (initiation), or legal (majority)
definitions.example: Go easy on him: he is but a child.

definitions.definition: (with possessive) One's direct descendant by birth, regardless of age; a son or daughter.
definitions.example: My youngest child is forty-three this year.

definitions.definition: The cognomen given to the oldest son prior to his taking his father's title.
